args.name: command
args.description: A command to get information about.

subcommands.name: results/load
subcommands.description: Imports all results from a given directory.

subcommands.name: games/sync
subcommands.description: Synchronize not synchronized games from DB to public API.

args.name: limit
args.description: Maximum number of games to synchronize

subcommands.name: autocomplete/get
subcommands.description: Generate an autocomplete JSON for all available commands.

args.name: out
args.description: If set, output will be written to the [out] file. Otherwise, output will be written to stdout.
